title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20"! This lightweight hardside suitcase is the perfect companion for your next adventure. Available in vibrant colors like Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple, this suitcase not only looks stylish but is also incredibly durable.

Made from ABS hard shell and a steel rod frame, this suitcase is built to last. The 360-degree silent double spinner wheels make maneuvering through busy airports a breeze. With a capacity of 33L, you'll have plenty of space for all your essentials for a 1-3 day trip.

Not only is this suitcase practical, but it's also packed with features. The TSA lock ensures your belongings are secure, while the interior mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps keep everything organized. The scratch-resistant design means this suitcase will look good as new even after many trips.

Don't compromise on style or functionality when you travel. Choose the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" for your next journey.
